channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: cohesion (1.1)
item.description: A tool for measuring Python class cohesion.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-type-checking (2.3.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pylint (0.2)
item.description: Flake8 plugin that runs PyLint.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-keyword-function-parameters (0.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to lint for keyword-only function parameters
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-aaa (0.14)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin that checks Python tests follow the Arrange-Act-Assert pattern
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-balanced-wrapping (0.1.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin that helps you wrap code with visual balance.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-aaa (0.13.1)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin that checks Python tests follow the Arrange-Act-Assert pattern
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pep585 (0.1.7)
item.description: flake8 plugin to enforce new-style type hints (PEP 585)
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-max-function-length (0.7.4)
item.description: A configurable flake8 plugin to enforce a maximum function/method length.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: types-flake8-2020 (1.7.0.2)

item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-plugin-utils
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-typing-imports

item.title: New: flake8-custom-error-messages (0.1.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to customize the error messages emitted by other flake8 plugins
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-max-function-length (0.7.3)
item.description: Configurable flake8 plugin for maximum function length
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-aaa (0.13)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin that checks Python tests follow the Arrange-Act-Assert pattern
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pytest-style (1.7.2)
item.description: A flake8 plugin checking common style issues or inconsistencies with pytest-based tests.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: types-flake8-bugbear (23.2.13)
item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-bugbear
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (23.2.13)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-boolean-trap (1)
item.description: flake8 plugin which forbids boolean positional arguments
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-import-as-module (0.1)
item.description: A Flake8 plugin to check if specific packages are imported as modules.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pytest-style (1.7)
item.description: A flake8 plugin checking common style issues or inconsistencies with pytest-based tests.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-copyright (0.2.4)
item.description: Adds copyright checks to flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-import-conventions (0.1)
item.description: An opinionated plugin for Flake8 on how certain packages should be imported or aliased.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-iw (0.0.16)
item.description: A plugin to show lint errors for IW
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-implicit-str-concat (0.4)
item.description: Flake8 plugin to encourage correct string literal concatenation.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: dlint (0.14)
item.description: Dlint is a tool for encouraging best coding practices and helping ensure Python code is secure.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-secure-coding-standard (1.4)
item.description: Flake8 plugin adding some checks to make Python code adhere to more secure coding standard
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-no-implicit-str-concat-in-list (0.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin that forbids implicit str/bytes literal concatenations
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-unused-arguments (0.0.13)
item.description: flake8 extension to warn on unused function arguments
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-requirements (1.7.7)
item.description: Package requirements checker, plugin for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-import-conventions (0.0.1)
item.description: An opinionated plugin for Flake8 on how certain packages should be imported or aliased.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pydocstyle (0.2.2)
item.description: flake8 plugin that integrates pydocstyle

item.title: Updated: flake8-tensors (0.3.1)
item.description: flake8_tensors - flake8 plugin for deep learning codes
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (23.1.2)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi stub files.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-get-chaining (0.2)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs when chaining dict.get calls
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-useless-assert (0.4.4)
item.description: flake8 plugin to catch useless `assert` statements

item.description: flake8_tensors - flake8 plugin for deep learning codes

item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs when chaining dict.get calls

item.title: Updated: flake8-pyi (23.1.1)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 to enable linting .pyi stub files.

item.title: New: flake8-no-debug-vars (0.1)
item.description: A flake8 plugin to ban variables test or debug to be True
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bas (0.1.2)
item.description: Flake8 extension that checks for blank lines around (compound) statements.

item.description: Flake8 extension to check FastAPI routes all use the same case

item.description: Extension for flake8 which uses pydocstyle to check docstrings
